lexUnit.name: tall.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: of great or more than average height.

sentence.text: Immediately below the road a National Trust car park , placed between a distinctive tall chimney and ruined engine building of the long defunct Carn Galver mine , marks the starting point .
I was like a man in the street who was trying to talk to another man at the top of a very tall building .
Two particular characteristics of regional building style were the tall towers -- either for churches or civic buildings -- and the development of the rib vault which , in Italy , was unusual .
Unbeknown to Norris , the sliver-- a name given to tall narrow apartment buildings by New Yorkers -- has been the scene of some pretty gruesome goings on .
Jessamy opened her eyes , then swiftly closed them again as she saw his tall figure standing there .
With the coffee , Armagnac was offered , and an innocuous-looking local spirit , served in a tall bottle with a carved wooden figure inside it .
Struggling with a painful emotion which she preferred not to analyse , but which felt uncomfortably like jealousy , Luce watched his tall figure disappear into the café .
Shelley shrugged , and turned her attention back to the tall figure in the centre of attention .
She leaned against the wooden wall , and tried to flatten herself as a tall thin man came out of an adjacent door and turned in her direction .
The tall man screamed with pain , slumping forward , Newman 's hand came down , nails jabbing into the back of the half-withdrawn hand .
A tall young man came into the back of the room .
` There 's not a mark there , " she pulled back to comment as the tall man bent nearer .
Meg went to a tall megalith standing benevolently by a very old gnarled tree .
Would he kiss Doreen beneath the shelter of the tall trees ?
` It grows on the top of very tall trees in wet forests a long way away , and little frogs spend their whole lives in it .
A tall woman leaned from a balcony and emptied a bucket of water over them .
A tall woman with the chic , efficient look that spells Milan held up her notebook , and Di Leonardo immediately nodded encouragingly at her .
